sections.title: Definitions

content.text: In this by-law, unless the context otherwise requires:
content.meaning: Here's the meanings behind our fancy words:

content: "Act" means the Not-for-Profit Corporations Act, 2010 (Ontario) and, where the context requires, includes the regulations made under it, as amended or re-enacted from time to time;

content.text: "Board" means the board of directors of the Corporation
content.meaning: "Board" means the awesome team of folks that make the magic happen at PLADO

content.text: "By-laws" means this by-law (including the schedules to this by-law) and all other by-laws of the Corporation as amended and which are, from time to time, in force
"Chair" means the chair of the Board
content.meaning: "Chair" means the guy or gal making sure things are always working

content.text: "Corporation" means the legal entity of PLADO Inc.
"Director" means an individual occupying the position of director of the Corporation by whatever name he or she is called
content.meaning: "Director" means a single awesome person from the Board

content.text: "Donation" means a benefit provided by a third-party for the use of the Corporation
"In-kind Donation" means a Donation provided by a third-party for the use of the Corporation in the form of an unpaid good or service
content.meaning: "In-kind Donation" means free stuff thrown at us

content: "Member" means a member of the Corporation
"Members" means the collective membership of the Corporation
"Officer" means an officer of the Corporation which is defined as a President, Chair, secretary, treasurer, or Director

content.text: "President" means an individual holding the office of the President of the Corporation by whatever name he or she is called
content.meaning: "President" means the guy or gal motivating the Board

content.text: "Teacher" means an individual occupying the position of teacher of the Corporation by whatever name he or she is called
content.meaning: "Teacher" means one of those geniuses that share their knowledge
